summary: A successful lawyer who, in order to save her daughter, is pressured into defending the innocence of a man slated to receive the death penalty.
cast: Yunjin Kim|Mi-suk Kim|Hee-soon Park|Moo-Seong Choi|Hang-Seon Jang|Jin-woo Yang|Jung Dong-hwan|Oh Kwang-rok|Ji-young Ok|Won Poong-Yeon|Hyeon-jong Sin
keywords: tape over mouth|bound and gagged|handcuffs|defense attorney|corrupt politician
title: Sebeun deijeu
